Reviews.Title: Excellent LARGE unlocked phone with GREAT sound. (This review pertains to the International Unlocked version.)
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "bestbenwade"
Reviews.Content: First, let me say I will never lock myself into a contract again. I waited two weeks before writing this review, so I have really used my new phone. I read that you need two hands to use the phone. I have not found that to be true, but the reality is: if you have very small hands - don't buy it. After I first bought the Note, I was having some "buyer's remorse" because of the price. However, the phone was half the price of the soon-to-be-released SG3, although it didn't have "Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS)," and it's processor had slightly lower specs. In operation, I found it to be very fast and responsive, even after I installed another launcher that caused my old phone to "choke." I am VERY HAPPY with the volume on this phone. The speakers are loud and clear (for a cell phone), and the in-call volume is great (I'm hard-of-hearing - so that's a big deal for me!).The phone is very thin, if that's important to you (I think this concern is just an overblown advertising gimmick perpetrated by the "fruit" company. What finally got rid of my "buyer's remorse" completely was when I found out that the phone CAN be updated to ICS. Just Google ICS and Samsung Note and you'll find simple instructions.  The phone does everything I want it to do and it does it quickly and seamlessly. It never freezes or chokes. With Aldiko - a reading app, and the Kindle app, I can read all my books without squinting thanks to the huge screen, and the sound is great. Enjoy this phone for half the cost of the competition and use a pre-paid GSM SIM to get unlimited phone, text, and data. As an aside, I am using this phone with pay-as-you-go T-Mobile (under the brand name SIMPLE mobile - with unlimited everything). The phone WILL NOT GET 3G on T-Mobile, it only gets EDGE, but I find that getting UNLIMITED data makes up for that, and it is fast enough to stream Youtube etc. The phone WILL get 4G on AT&T;, but I cannot find a true unlimited plan from AT&T;, so scr*w them. On the other hand, because the phone is unlocked, I can use AT&T; pre-paid anytime I want to if I really need 4G and I don't mind being ripped off.

Reviews.Title: The best phone I have ever used....
Reviews.Author: Fernando Diaz
Reviews.Content: Let me just start saying about some people here on Amazon giving the Note bad reviews cause its to big....YOU ARE THE PROBLEM...YOU GOT TINY HANDS....GO BACK TO YOUR IPHONE 3.5" TINY SCREEN....PERIOD...Also let me point out that this import version completely destroys the ATT version of the NOTE..I had the ATT version and after a month of use, its a sloppy slow phone...things start to slow down and bad battery life..GET the real version...with the Exynos GPU...I have my Note running a 1ghz down from 1.4ghz, and let me tell you its buttery smooth...especially with ICS.Also the middle button is 10x better than those capacitive buttons on the US version..You don't have to look at it when your driving and need to exit any app..NO LTE meaning no battery life drainage..meaning it runs fine on HSDPS+....And my favorite part about it is the rooting community...It has so much support compare to the US Note....

Reviews.Title: The best mobile device on the planet !!!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Buy one of these for everyone in your family. This is the most amazing mobile device I have ever owned and I'm kind of a nerd ( I've had 6 mobile devices in the last 6 months).This will do everything that your tablet, phone and camera will do. If you like android then you need to buy this ASAP.

Reviews.Title: Best cell phone ever.
Reviews.Author: Two in a Jeep
Reviews.Content: Looking for a phone that was large enough and bright in daylight, a quality camera, GPS + GLONASS and able to buy a rugged case for. This phone can not be beat. I have had other phones include iphone and for what I needed there is nothing better. I am a land surveyor and work with Search and Rescue so I needed something to fit the bill and this is it.

Reviews.Title: best screen on any cellphone
Reviews.Author: Curt D. Westphal
Reviews.Content: This international version of the Galaxy Note has not failed to impress, even among all my iphone using friends. The screen is large, yes, but amazingly beautiful and sharp colors. Very easy to change batteries if needed, and sim access is just under battery. I love the home button on this better than the USA version for AT&T; as it's much easier to find. It came with Android ICS installed already, so no need to upgrade yet. It automatically switches between WIFI and my data plan with no issues.Only two things worth mentioning. Being as it is an "International" version, it doesn't come with an American style charge plug. However, the plug is easily removed from the cord and has a USB plug which can easily be plugged into PC or laptop for charging. I ordered a car charger online for a few dollars and it works great.When buying a case for this I chose a bookstyle model which takes the place of the rear cover. The USA and international versions apparently have different back covers, so I ordered mine from AmazonUK and it fit perfectly. I see some who bought from Amazon USA and had difficulties.

Reviews.Title: Best smartphone ever!
Reviews.Author: Sheng P. Su "aejunior"
Reviews.Content: Need a device that can replace paper, has a large comfortable viewing screen for watching videos in HD, and is as stylish as the iPhone4S? Well, this is it!With it's 5.3 inch screen, this phone always catches someone's eyes. Everywhere I go people can't help commenting on it's size, trying out the useful S-Pen, and trying out the latest Android apps.Cons: It is possible that this phone will not fit comfortably in your pocket. The screen and back picks up smudges easily. Battery life is okay - without data I can use my phone for a day.

Reviews.Title: When I first saw it I said "no way" it's too big!"
Reviews.Author: F. Juarez
Reviews.Content: It grows on you, you can do just about everything with it! The display is great,it's fast,the sound is good, the camera and video are good. I'm learning to use the s pen, I have to hide it from my daughter, she loves drawing on it! When you go back to a "regular size phone" You'll say it's too small!

Reviews.Title: good product with its flaw
Reviews.Author: tokunbo
Reviews.Content: the Samsung Galaxy Note GT-N7000 Unlocked Cellphone is a nice big phone . the concept is good and i am sure this kinda of size o phone would be adopted by other phone makers. the draw down to this is the battery only gives about two hours of talk time. so for someone on the go , it means constant recharging which is painful

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy note unlocked
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Totally and utterly thrilled with my purchase. The Samsung Galaxy note looks as if it came direct to me today from Samsung and is brand new. One of the best buys ever off of Amazon, perhaps THE best.There was a slight mixup with shipping but the seller got involved personally and very professionally and instantly took care of the situation. I would buy anything this sellers has to offer if I need it. Very impressed with his personal approach, good manners, and concern for the concern.Excellent product, fabulous new condition, great customer service. Can't ask for better than that! Recommend this seller wholeheartedly!

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note Internationally Unlocked -- Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Tamara J Welter
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! Using it with T-Mobile, but transitioning to StraightTalk (hopefully). Love everything about the phone (except the pen, maybe).

Reviews.Title: Perfect for travelling
Reviews.Author: EYE4GET
Reviews.Content: There are a ton of reviews of the Samsung Note.  I wanted to cover the International aspects  of this phone. It uses a full sized SIM card.  Great for traveling and you don't need to special (iPhone sized card)  Solid signal strength and large, easy to read screen.  Sound quality is also very nice. Very happy I choose this phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: icurac
Reviews.Content: Just perfect for me! I use to have an iPad 1st generation and a Iphone but now this can replace both! I take a lot of notes, edit photos, take pictures.. and it's really confortable to write sms and even long e-mails aren't a problem! Just the battery could be a little better.

Reviews.Title: Great mobile phone, spectacular screen!!!
Reviews.Author: Oded
Reviews.Content: Looks very handsome (take the white one) and feels nice in hand.Love this product ... it is much more than a smartphone.I think it is more cost effective to get Galaxy Note than S3 for now ($580 vs. $680).

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: HuntersPad
Reviews.Content: Great Phone! I had the AT&T; version of this previously, Thought I`d try a One X, Then I ended up with this:D  I ordered it yesterday from Directly from Amazon Ordered around 6PM yesterday, Got it Today as 10am:)  I got the overnight shipping!  Great Phone, Fast!. Battery life of course is so so, as it was with the AT&T; Version.  Comes with REALLY Great Headphones.The only Grip, Is this WAS an International Phone, Amazon Must had thrown in an US adapter. I know that IM in THE USA, But I wanted the international Charger.Here is a unboxing  (..)

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone / tablet
Reviews.Author: BDG
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for over 2 weeks now and I love love love it! Was a bit apprehensive that it would be too big but turns out that the size is perfect for reading e-books and sending emails on the go.  It is rather big though, to use with one hand, but the voice operation function takes care of that. Not too happy with the battery life as I had run out of juice twice, at midday, hence the 4 instead of 5 stars. However, I bought a car charger and may get a spare battery too to solve that. Overall, it is great both as a phone and as a small, lightweight, and handy tablet.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: Karen Harris
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use with the straight talk cell phone service. I was nervous since I have always used the phones that straight talk provides. I purchased an ATT sim card and it works perfect. I love love love it!!! Best cell phone I have ever owned. I am just so worried that I will drop it or something will happen to it. I wish that they had offered some sort of Insurance on it.

Reviews.Title: Read my message , ignore the rating of one star .
Reviews.Author: caolaoshi
Reviews.Content: i ordered G t - N -7000 but a similar and cheaper model was shipped to me . So i cannot give it a rating .Also , if I click on a star , I can not get to type my message here to explain --So please ignore my one -star rating . I returned the wrong phone,BTW .

Reviews.Title: Bad idea
Reviews.Author: amanda foussena mensah
Reviews.Content: Samsung galaxy note 1 is good only when you get the samsung usa, the international version does not have warranty even when you buy it new and worldwide distributors on Amazon are selling the fake china made so it last only 4 months and you start having problems with the  charging ports. Beware of Worldwide Distributors,they sell fake China made samsung galaxy note.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever and service was great!!!
Reviews.Author: jerry_h1988
Reviews.Content: I order the unlocked version of this phone and I abesoluely love this phone and was very pleased with the service I recieved from both amazon.com customer service and seller tmh42790! So far I have no complaints and I honesly don't see how any can form. Now to this phone... HEAVEHN SENT!!!!!! If Jesus used a phone, it would be this! I love everything about it. From the camera to the s-pen. I cant think of one thing thats not awesome. Screen is crazy beautiful and the speed of this phone is super fast! I actually have been in areas that have basically no service whichs kicks me down to just basic service and this phone still manages to move way faster than my other phone. I AM SOLD!! I have been trying to figure out how I lived this long without it and how I will if I have to ever change! Thanks samsung!! This was a hit out of the park!

Reviews.Title: amazing!!!
Reviews.Author: barbie
Reviews.Content: Im so shocked and i love dys phne. It is very big, and i love it, nice we love it

Reviews.Title: my  besty
Reviews.Author: Eli Johns
Reviews.Content: great phone, my besty still use it... performs well  good battery life...  my besty. Wide screen for  clear viewing on line, larger touch screeen keyboard, more apps  its just better phone.. my besty ;) kudos

Reviews.Title: for saler
Reviews.Author: cheng
Reviews.Content: the phone service is no that satisfied, my phone sometime no working for typing, i don't know who i can ask for help my question,

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note 1
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Dzisoo
Reviews.Content: Not being a hi-tech person, I had initial challenges trying to find my way on using it. But as I am getting the hang of it I am starting to enjoy it.But I cannot enjoy all the potential the phone has to offer, as the service provider is not up to scratch.

Reviews.Title: Amazing hybrid!
Reviews.Author: Angel Ortiz
Reviews.Content: The phone is fast and very reliable. It does show a little bit of lag but nothing of concern.The thing I was more interested in when buying the Note was reading programming books in PDF. I do have a 10 inch (1024x768 px) tablet for reading those, but, because of the size, is not very portable or easy to hold. Books look a little sharper in the Note. The screen is small compared to the tablet, but I have good sight and can read almost any book without problems. I am thinking seriously about selling the tablet.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: deny
Reviews.Content: excelente producto y muy bello, llego en excelente condicion ningun desperfecto lo recomiendo en su maxima expresion, producto de muy buena calidad mil veces mejor que el iphone 5

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought
Reviews.Author: Brittney Wilkinson
Reviews.Content: Very light and pretty very thin awesome affects and everyone will hate on you because nothing is bigger than it other than a tablet

Reviews.Title: Good ass Phone
Reviews.Author: Tanthalas
Reviews.Content: Theres nothing that aint been said about the G-Note that hasnt been said before. So I wont bother with it. This is the best phone for 2012 godamnittt!!! I wish the phone was a little bit bigger though. I just need a bigger screen........definitely bigger yo. I ordered the Galaxy Note but received the Note 2 instead. I guess, Im juss that damnnn lucky than. So for the ress of u........sorry bout yo damnnn luck!!! I know everyones heard of McDonalds slogan "Im Lovin It", thats how I feel about my G-Note too!!!After readin through some reviews where people said they done received boxes that hadt the seals broken already......well, that shiet made me nervous. But when my package arrived, my box had 3 seals on it and they was all intact. Heres some quick Pros n ConsPros:Big ass screenQuad Core = Fast as hellNo lagsSD Card expandable2 gigs of RAMJellyBean......though I prefer IceCream Sandwhich, I mean it literallyDid I mention...........big ass screenCons:Needs a bigger ass screenIm not a fan of the 16:9 Aspect Ratio

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Note
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY PHONE.  Had a Nokia N900 before and loved it....wanted something similar.  I did my research and found this jewel.

Reviews.Title: It's a good product...until the Note 2 arrived
Reviews.Author: Hardright
Reviews.Content: I must say I enjoyed the short stint I had with this device.  I had a Samsung S3 that I really liked but I preferred this one because of its note taking capabilities.  A few months later, Note 2 comes and I upgraded to that.The Note behaved entirely different from the S3.  I was hoping that some of the S3 features were in Note, but it wasn't.  For example, Note didn't have the ability to scroll the top menu (where you have wifi, blue tooth, sound, etc).  You were limited to 5 basic functions (wifi, bluetooth, gps, sound and auto rotation).  There are more features that Note missed from S3.Fortunately, Note 2 is an S3 in Note form.  This is probably the best device to get now.  I would expect Note prices to drop significantly as Note 2 sales pick up.  I wouldn't buy Note unless the price was half of that of a Note 2.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note Rock's!!!!
Reviews.Author: DAVIS93
Reviews.Content: I Bought this Samsung Galaxy Note because, I love bigger screen's...I was completely WoWeD when I opened the box. The Galaxy Note is one of the Best Phone's I have ever had. And I had the I-phone 4S And the Droid, and I would still pick this phone any day. I can't go anywhere with out people stopping me to ask me if that's a phone, and where I bought it. Display is really Good, Opening Web Page's is really fast, Also got to love the free App's from Android. You can't go wrong with the Galaxy Note...:)

Reviews.Title: galaxy note
Reviews.Author: synrx
Reviews.Content: excellent travel companion. Good battery life in the hours. Lots of apps especially the maps for road gps is invaluable in new countries. Adobe made a mistake with stopping flash for it though.

Reviews.Title: A TOP of the line wireless phone !
Reviews.Author: hdtravel
Reviews.Content: This is just the BEST wireless handset out there.The screen is big and gorgeous. Bright and vivid color. 5.3" of pure visual honey.The stylus is handy.It is speedy and smooth. Apps launch fast and moving between screens is fluid.The 2500 mAh battery is high capacity and lasts all day.Once you have this "phablet" phone there is no going back to smaller screens.Audio quality is quite good through the built-in speakers and the earpiece.Highly recommended !

Reviews.Title: Very good phone and excellent customer services
Reviews.Author: alberto concepcion
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best, I used it  first with  t mobile and then switch to straightalk and is the best.

Reviews.Title: So love the phone however...
Reviews.Author: poshkiss
Reviews.Content: After months of researching on what phone to buy, i finally decided on the galaxy note. Received it yesterday (days earlier than the expected date), was a little bit shocked since the plastic which it was packed was opened although it was packed in a box. Automatically i reach for the phone and checked the seal if it was tampered fortunately it was still intact. I charged it and everything works fine. I tried to connect it to wifi since we have wireless internet but somehow it doesn't work. So today, went to at&t; to have a line but still it can't connect to the web. They told me when they tried to scan the barcode of they phone it shows blackberry. They tried to adjust something in their system but still it doesn't work. I told them it must be the APN settings but they told me since the phone doesn't have warranty they don't want to change anything and they told me I can't use the net with this phone. When i got home i tried to check the APN settings but i can't seem to change it. So disappointed. I really love this phone and I want to make everything work. Can someone please help me how to resolve this problem?Is At&t; the only network where this phone works?

Reviews.Title: Good cell phone but battery life terrible with 4.03 ICS
Reviews.Author: Lamartiny S Gomes "Lamartiny Silveira Gomes"
Reviews.Content: Not so fast as Iphone iOS 5.11 (my last phone) and the ICS 4.0.3 sometimes stops and comes back.The overall performance is fine but the battery time is very short, I charge every night and remove the power outlet at 7am. At 6pm my battery is 15%, I don't use it so much, one or two short calls the entire day.The screen quality is awesome, sound of phone calls are great too, wi fi is perfect, apps runs very good too, the google store is better every day with great apps and games.

Reviews.Title: Wrong product
Reviews.Author: Gareth W Beattie
Reviews.Content: Here I goofed. I ordered this thinking I was getting a Note 2. When I returned the product, I paid the shipping out of my pocket. The company that provided the product charged me over $40 for shipping and restocking.

Reviews.Title: Slow speed
Reviews.Author: rwlavan
Reviews.Content: Can anyone tell me why I am getitng extremly slow speed with my Galaxy GTN7000 the first two weeks it was lighting fast and then it slow down to dial up speed.  Am i doing something wrong?  Can anyone help? I am with AT&T; unlimited plan

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Dorila
Reviews.Content: Perfect Conditions got here even before the estimated arrival time! i didnt know it was gonna be so fast i am still exited!! imma keeo buying here!

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT HAVE US WARRANTY
Reviews.Author: Po-lun, Li "Po"
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE ITSELF HAS MAJOR PROBLEMS SUCH AS SCREEN TEAR, AUTOMATIC SHUT DOWN, AND BATTERY FAST USAGE WHEN NOT OPERATING ANY SOFTWARE. ALSO, IT DOES NOT HAVE US WARRANTY SO BUYERS HAVE TO SENT IT TO LATIN AMERICA TO HAVE IT REPAIRED. AND THE SELLER INSISTS NOT ACCEPTING THE RETURN BY SIMPLY SAYS "IT HAS PASSED THE 30 DAY RETURN WINDOW" EVEN THOUGH ITS ONLY THE PHONE`S PROBLEM. GUESS HE JUST WANT THE MONEY. WELL, THINK ABOUT IT BEFORE YOU BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: Cheating with the prices here , advertised price is $275.00 but after selecting the item the price is changing to $450..Its bad.
Reviews.Author: A.J
Reviews.Content: Cheating with the prices here , advertised price is $275.00 but after selecting the item the price is changing to $450..Its bad.Will report this to BBB , misleading with the wrong prices and wasting my valuable time.I wanted to give Zero stars..for this type of sellers.Customers Beware..N7000 Samsung Galaxy Note Unlocked Android Smartphone (White)

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note
Reviews.Author: Julius Glickstein
Reviews.Content: Cons. Requires two hand operation. Impossible quickly respond to the call - first you have to press on the side, then unlock by swipping or tapping with your finger, then kiss it and if the client still has time - start talking. Very sensitive screen - one wrong move of the finger and you're somewhere else into another menu. etc, etc...  probably all smartphones have these issues. Not laud enough for me - my Samsung rougby has much stronger volume. When you close to heavy equipemnt you hardly hear your opponent. This was my first one and I return it back the day I received it.Pros. Large screen, crisp, fast internet, good for them who has bad vision or enough time to be precise with thgeir fingers.I don't have this time. I'm getting 50-150 tel calls a day, so I needed one botton one push operationDidn't check photo and video cameras, assuming that they both have poor quality in comparison with my photo/video equipment

ProductInfo.Features:
Android OS v2.3 ( Gingerbread)
8MP AF and 2MP frontal camera
Multi Input Full Touch + S Pen
5.3" WXGA HD super AMOLED
GPS
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Note GT-N7000 Unlocked Cellphone--International Version(Ceramic White)
